amendatorysection.catchline: Medical Home Pilot Program Act; act, how cited; purpose; termination.
amendatorysection.para: Sections 68-957 to 68-961 shall be known and may be cited as the Medical Home Pilot Program Act. The Medical Home Pilot Program Act terminates on June 30, 2014. The purposes of the act are to improve health care access and health outcomes for patients and to contain costs of the medical assistance program.
